name: BossBaby
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boss baby
Developer Terms of Use
des: Boss Baby is looking for a new leader of Baby Corp, and YOU seem like a top candidate! Answer trivia questions across math, history, general knowledge and more, in order to advance through levels and climb the corporate level to the ultimate goal of Big Boss Baby. You can unlock the full game by purchasing the Boss Baby Full Edition. All the levels are available through Freetime Unlimited subscriptions.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
